sentences.en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentences.cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentences.en: He decided to escape and seek a more secluded hotel.
sentences.cn: 他决定逃走,找一家平静些的旅馆.

sentences.en: He remains secluded in his room.
He was kept under detention in a peaceful and secluded place.
He’s 80 years old now and lives a very secluded life.
sentences.cn: 他现在80岁了，过着远离尘嚣的生活。

sentences.en: Schejerbeck chose to live a secluded life mainly because ____.
sentences.cn: Schejerbeck选择了一种隐居生活主要因为_____.

sentences.en: Some people like to strip themselves naked while they have a swim in a secluded place.
sentences.cn: 一些人当他们在隐蔽的地方游泳时,喜欢把衣服脱光.

sentences.en: That life is private and secluded from eruptions of undesirable strangers.
sentences.cn: 那种生活是闲静的,可以不受讨厌的局外人的打搅.
这地方风景如画, 十分幽静.

sentences.en: The rich secluded themselves from contact with the poor.
The three led a joyous and secluded life, contented , industrious, happy, asking nothing better.
sentences.cn: 三个人过着快快活活的隐居生活, 心里又满足又愉快, 工作勤劳, 与世无争.

sentences.en: They went away in the boat to a secluded place by themselves.
sentences.cn: 可6:32他们就坐船、暗暗的往旷野地方去.

sentences.en: This charming cottage dates back to the 15 th century and is as pretty as a picture, with its thatched roof and secluded garden.
sentences.cn: 这所美丽的村舍是15世纪时的建筑,有茅草房顶和宁静的花园,漂亮极了,简直和画上一样.

sentences.en: Tiny secluded beaches can be found off the beaten track.
sentences.cn: 在人迹罕至的地方可以找到一些隐蔽的小海滩。

sentences.en: We found a secluded beach a few miles further on.
sentences.cn: 我们又前行了几英里，发现了一处僻静的海滩。

sentences.en: When Nixon secluded himself again to work on his inaugural address, the situation changed.
sentences.cn: 当尼克松又闭门写他的就职演说时, 情况发生了变化.

trans.tran_cn: 与世隔绝的，隐退的，偏僻的
使隔开，使隐退( seclude的过去式和过去分词)
